-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


@package icalendar-gogol
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | This module provides functions to map subparts of a <a>VEvent</a> to
--   <a>Text</a>. Especially the part of a <a>Recur</a> object is useful
--   here for the conversion of a <a>VEvent</a>.
--   
--   The code is basically a copy of the <a>Printer</a> module, which does
--   not export functionality to print the <i>subparts</i> of a
--   Text.<a>VEvent</a> object.
module Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat

-- | A typeclass that specifies that the given type can be printed as
--   specified by the iCal format.
class IsValue a

-- | Convert the given item to a <a>ContentPrinter</a> that prints it as
--   specified by the iCal format.
printValue :: IsValue a => a -> ContentPrinter ()

-- | A type synonym of a way to print data. This makes use of the
--   <a>Builder</a> to generate the stream and the <a>EncodingFunctions</a>
--   as state.
type ContentPrinter = RWS EncodingFunctions Builder Int

-- | A datatype that is used as state to construct a textual representation
--   of the objects.
data EncodingFunctions

-- | A typeclass that is used to print items as properties of a
--   <i>parent</i> element.
class IsProperty a

-- | print the element as specified by the iCal format.
printProperty :: IsProperty a => a -> ContentPrinter ()
propertyToText :: IsProperty a => a -> Text
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.Quoting
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.Quoting
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.Quoting
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam Text.ICalendar.Types.DateTime
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam Text.ICalendar.Types.ExDate
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam a => Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam (GHC.Maybe.Maybe a)
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam Text.ICalendar.Types.OtherParams
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam Text.ICalendar.Types.Period
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam Text.ICalendar.Types.RDate
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam a => Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.ToParam (Data.Set.Internal.Set a)
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty a => Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty (Data.Set.Internal.Set a)
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty a => Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty (GHC.Maybe.Maybe a)
instance (Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty a, Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty b) => Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty (Data.Either.Either a b)
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty Text.ICalendar.Types.ExDate
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty Text.ICalendar.Types.RDate
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsProperty Text.ICalendar.Types.RRule
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue Text.ICalendar.Types.Date
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue Text.ICalendar.Types.DateTime
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue Text.ICalendar.Types.Duration
instance (Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue a, Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue b) => Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue (Data.Either.Either a b)
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue Text.ICalendar.Types.Period
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue Text.ICalendar.Types.Recur
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue Text.ICalendar.Types.Weekday
instance Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter.ICalFormat.IsValue Text.ICalendar.Types.RDate


-- | This module provides a convenient way to convert a <a>VEvent</a> to an
--   <a>Event</a>.
module Network.Google.AppsCalendar.Converter

-- | Convert the given <a>VEvent</a> object to an <a>Event</a> object.
convertToEvent :: VEvent -> Event
